## ğŸ·ï¸ Versioning & Compatibility

**Important:** If your changes impact the ontology structure or compatibility, you **must** update the version in the ontology file (e.g., `owl:versionInfo` or similar).

Please select the tag that fits your change:

- [ ] **Patch** (Bug fix or non-breaking change that does not add new types)
- [ ] **Minor** (New functionality/types that are backward-compatible)
- [ ] **Major** (Breaking change that makes existing Self-Descriptions invalid)

## ğŸ—ï¸ Type of change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] New type (non-breaking change which adds a type)
- [ ] Change (non-breaking change or fix on an existing type)
- [ ] Breaking change (Change that would cause existing Self Descriptions not to be accepted anymore by a Federated Catalogue)
